title: Leftover and meal prep planning
description: Mark recipes as 'makes leftovers for lunch'. Meal prep mode: batch cook Sunday, plan portioning. Ingredient reuse across meals (Monday roast chicken → Wednesday chicken salad). Freezer inventory tracking.

title: Recipe import from URL — AI extraction pipeline
description: Paste a recipe URL, fetch the page, check for Recipe schema (ld+json/microdata), fall back to Claude API extraction. Extract: title, ingredients, steps, prep/cook time, servings, hero image. Mirror the newhome import pattern. Support hundreds of recipe sites.
close_reason: Recipe import pipeline built: URL fetch → recipe-scrapers → Claude AI fallback → DB save + image download

title: 'What Can I Cook?' pantry mode
description: Maintain pantry inventory (or snap a photo of fridge). AI suggests recipes from your library that match what you have. Highlight recipes needing just 1-2 extra ingredients.

title: Cook-along mode with timers
description: Step-by-step cooking view: large text, one step at a time, screen stays on. Built-in per-step timers. Swipe to navigate. Voice control (next step, start timer). Send notification to spouse with ETA.
close_reason: Cook-along mode built: step-by-step, timers, wake lock, keyboard nav, serving multiplier, post-cook rating

title: Calendar-aware meal planning
description: Google Calendar integration (read-only). Detect dinner conflicts (events 5-9 PM, travel, restaurant reservations). Show available cook-at-home nights on the weekly planner view. Both OAuth and service account options to evaluate.
close_reason: Calendar integration built: manual events, dinner conflict detection, availability API, integrated into planner

title: Cookbooks / collections
description: Group recipes into themed collections: Date Night, Under 30 Min, Meal Prep Sunday, Michelle's Favorites, etc. Shareable via link.

title: 'Surprise Me' — recipe roulette and Tinder-style swipe
description: Decision fatigue killer. Spin-the-wheel from favorites, 'give me something new', 'something like X but different'. Tinder-style: both users swipe on suggestions, matches get auto-planned. Fun couple feature.
close_reason: Tinder swipe built: session creation, card pool, dual-user swiping, match detection, framer-motion card UI

title: Dual ratings system — both users rate after cooking
description: After cooking a recipe, both Trevor and Michelle rate independently: 1-5 stars, would make again (bool), free-text notes. Show both ratings on recipe detail. Feeds into taste learning.
close_reason: Dual ratings built: both users rate independently, feeds taste learning, marks meal plan as cooked

title: AI meal suggestion engine
description: Given available nights, dietary rules, recipe history, and recipe library — suggest a week of meals. Respect all rules, avoid recent repeats, balance variety. Use Claude API for intelligent suggestions.
close_reason: AI suggestion engine built: Claude-powered meal suggestions respecting rules, history, taste profiles

title: Dietary rules engine
description: Configurable rules for meal planning: protein frequency (chicken max 2x/week, salmon 1x/2weeks), vegetarian minimums, no repeat recipes within N days, custom rules. Planner evaluates all rules before suggesting. Visual indicators for rule status.
close_reason: Rules engine built: protein_max, protein_min, no_repeat, min_tag rules with evaluation and week status

title: Project scaffolding — FastAPI + Next.js + PostgreSQL + Docker
description: Set up the initial project structure: FastAPI backend, Next.js frontend (or vanilla JS+Jinja2 — decide), PostgreSQL on Framework, Docker Compose, Cloudflare tunnel at cook.trevorduke.com. PWA support. Two-user auth (Trevor & Michelle).
close_reason: Full project scaffolded: FastAPI backend, Next.js frontend, PostgreSQL, Docker Compose, all models/routes/services

title: Smart shopping list generation
description: Auto-generate shopping list from the week's meal plan. Aggregate duplicate ingredients across recipes. Subtract pantry staples. Organize by aisle/category (produce, dairy, meat, pantry). Real-time shared checklist for both users at the store.
close_reason: Shopping list generator built: aggregates from meal plan, subtracts pantry staples, groups by aisle

title: Photo/OCR recipe import
description: Snap a photo of a recipe card, cookbook page, or handwritten recipe. OCR + Claude extracts structured recipe data. Useful for family recipes that aren't online.

title: Cooking stats and history dashboard
description: Track what you've cooked: monthly/yearly history, protein distribution charts, most cooked recipes, 'forgotten favorites' (loved but haven't made in 3+ months), home-cooking streaks.
close_reason: Taste learning + stats built: preference scoring from ratings, AI insights, profile comparison between users
